title: *TRADED* - FS / FT Cobb Bat-on SOVEREIGN PSA-4

posts.post_title: *TRADED* - FS / FT Cobb Bat-on SOVEREIGN PSA-4
posts.post_content:
FS/FT:     T206 Cobb Bat-on Sovereign PSA-4

TRADED -  $7,999

For Trade: Looking for a T206 Nice-for-Grade Cobb(s), Common back, No Qualifiers, prefer No Half-grades, PSA or SGC.

Please reply to my email:  [url]arkansas2014@gmail.com[/url]

Steve
